summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3963 for the improvement of East Lee Street, from 38th Avenue North to 39th Avenue North; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48251, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
